description: This Python script demonstrates how to use the OpenAITools toolkit within an Agno Agent to generate images based on prompts, specifically utilizing OpenAI's image generation capabilities (e.g., DALL-E). It sets up an agent with specific models and tools, runs a prompt to generate an image, and saves the resulting image to a file.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with models and tools to perform tasks.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt to generate a response, potentially including images.
